title: Jim's cheese and onion soda bread
ingredients: ['550g bread flour, plus more for dusting', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '6 tablespoons butter, softened', '300ml buttermilk', '2 tablespoons caster or icing sugar, to taste', '120g finely chopped onion', '85g grated Cheddar cheese']
